main event: Witnesses observed a round, transparent object that was stationary for 20 minutes over Vermillion, Ohio.
interesting points: The object was described as basketball-sized and emitted no sound., The sighting occurred at an altitude between 5,000 to 10,000 feet., Visibility was reported as clear during the observation period., There were a total of five witnesses to the sighting., The object remained stationary throughout the duration of the observation.
